name: The Heiress
description: How will life of Alice turn out? Will she redeem her noble name and life? Or will she just abandon herself and become a sex tool? Will she become something evil, or remain a virgin to her Good End? All of that is for you to decide!
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP 处理器: 1.2 GHz 内存: 2 GB RAM 存储空间: 需要 3 GB 可用空间
